Room.Name: Ennia's Pet Playroom
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large terrerium where numerous pets are kept on display.
Room.LongDescription: This large room is surrounded by glass and protected from the outside world. Oddly, you have found yourself curious about the animals in the room and have foolishly entered. The large scorpions and spiders probably think you're dinner. They're obviously not in the mood for playing around. It's a good think Ennia carries a good number of poison remedies.
